articles.title: How to spot November’s supermoon, the closest of the year
articles.description:
A so-called supermoon happens when a full moon is closer to Earth in its orbit.

The post How to spot November’s supermoon, the closest of the year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: November's supermoon occurs on November 14, 2025, appearing larger and brighter.
This supermoon is the closest to Earth this year, enhancing visibility for Boston residents.
Local astronomers encourage residents to view the supermoon for educational and recreational purposes.

articles.title: Explosion at Harvard Medical School appears to have been intentional, authorities say. No one hurt.
articles.description:
Police released grainy photos of two people wearing face coverings and what looked like sweatshirts.

The post Explosion at Harvard Medical School appears to have been intentional, authorities say. No one hurt. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explosion at Harvard Medical School deemed intentional; no injuries reported.
Police released photos of two suspects wearing sweatshirts and face coverings.
Incident raises safety concerns for Boston residents near academic institutions.
